Title: Establishes the police canine vest fund for the purpose of purchasing, maintaining, repairing and replacing soft body ballistic armor vests and other protective equipment for police K9 officers
Summary: Establishes the police canine vest fund for the purpose of purchasing, maintaining, repairing and replacing soft body ballistic armor vests and other protective equipment for police K9 officers.
LawCode: Add ยง97-bbbbb, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the police canine vest fund
